title: TypeError when running in NODE_ENV production
body:
Here is an example repo: https://github.com/quicksnap/wtfreact

I'm using babel-node to execute `index.js`. When I turn off `production`, it works fine. When in production, I get the error below. Am I missing something really obvious?

```
TypeError: Cannot set property 'props' of undefined
    at Object.defineProperty.set [as props] (/Users/dan/projects/express/node_modules/react/lib/ReactElement.js:52:24)
    at Object.ReactElement (/Users/dan/projects/express/node_modules/react/lib/ReactElement.js:136:14)
    at Object.ReactElement.createElement (/Users/dan/projects/express/node_modules/react/lib/ReactElement.js:193:10)
    at Object.ReactElementValidator.createElement (/Users/dan/projects/express/node_modules/react/lib/ReactElementValidator.js:396:46)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/dan/projects/express/wtf.js:11:19)
    at Module._compile (module.js:456:26)
    at normalLoader (/Users/dan/.nvm/v0.10.38/lib/node_modules/babel/node_modules/babel-core/lib/api/register/node.js:199:5)
    at Object.require.extensions.(anonymous function) [as .js] (/Users/dan/.nvm/v0.10.38/lib/node_modules/babel/node_modules/babel-core/lib/api/register/node.js:216:7)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:312:12)
```
